detail_desc: Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Dress in tulle with sequins and plastic rhinestones. Tulle frills around the neckline, short flutter sleeves and a concealed zip at the back. Seam at the waist and a flared, voluminous skirt in multiple asymmetric layers of tulle. Lined.
Sheer jersey top in a narrow cut at the top with lace at the back, narrow shoulder straps and an opening with a button at the back of the neck.
Hipster briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
PREMIUM QUALITY. Trousers in soft, fine-knit cashmere with wide elasticated ribbing at the waist and straight, wide legs with roll-edge hems.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in a cotton weave with elasticated smocking and a short frill trim at the top, 3/4-length raglan sleeves with a slit and ties at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Frilled bikini top with lined cups with removable inserts, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a fastener at the back.
5-pocket skinny-fit trousers in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and a high cut at the back.
Sleeveless nursing tops in organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and practical inner top for easier nursing access.

Joggers in supersoft, stretch denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly and seams on the legs. Zipped front pockets, a welt back pocket and tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems.
Adjustable elastic braces with metal fasteners and imitation leather details.
Fitted jersey T-shirt in a soft viscose and cotton blend with embroidery and short, frill-trimmed sleeves.

Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar and classic front. Yoke with a pleat at the back, a chest pocket, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Double-layered hats in a soft, fine knit with matching embroidery on the turned-up hems.
Short dress in soft, patterned jersey with a scallop-edged V-neck, decorative buttons at the front, long sleeves and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Mittens in a soft knit with ribbed cuffs. Fleece lining.
Blouse in woven fabric with a boat neck, 3/4-length sleeves with inset lace trims and a flounce at the cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Long-sleeved shirt woven in a cotton blend with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs. Matching tie/bow tie.
Tube scarf in soft faux fur.
V-neck T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Long, fitted shirt in soft leather with a large, pointed collar and covered press-studs down the front. Tapered waist with a seam, long sleeves, cuffs with covered press-studs, and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Relaxed-fit jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Wide, shorter-style top in cotton jersey with cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Skater skirt in fine, textured-knit cotton with concealed elastication at the waist and a stocking-stitched hem.
Straight-cut jersey T-shirt in a relaxed fit with a round neck.

Dungaree shorts in washed, slightly stretchy denim with hard-worn details. Adjustable straps with metal fasteners, press-studs at the sides, a pocket at the top, front and back pockets, and frayed, raw-edge hems.
T-shirt in soft, patterned slub cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder.

Dungaree shorts in washed stretch denim with a flap chest pocket with a press-stud at the top and adjustable straps with a metal fastener. Seam at the waist, press-studs at the sides, a fake fly and front and back pockets.
Matt tights with extra space for a growing tummy. 40 denier. Some of the polyamide content of the tights is recycled.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Puff pants in a cotton weave with elastication and a decorative bow at the waist, and elasticated hems.
Jumper in a soft rib knit in a short, slightly wider style with a V-neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the joggers is organic.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
3/4-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing at the waist and a concealed key pocket in the waistband.

Ankle-length suit trousers in a stretch weave with an extended waistband, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets and legs with creases front and back and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Slim Fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.

Jumper in soft, rib-knit cotton with a lined hood and zip at the top that continues around the edge of the hood. Long raglan sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Shorter imitation suede jacket with imitation leather details. Large pile collar with double tabs, a diagonal zip at the front and zipped front pockets. Pile lining.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Fitted top in heavy jersey with a lace-inset low back and long sleeves.
Long, sleeveless dress in chiffon crêpe with a hook-and-eye fastener at the back of the neck, concealed zip at the back and a seam at the waist with beaded and sequined embroidery. Lined.
Mules in imitation leather with square, open toes, padded, braided straps and covered heels. Imitation leather insoles. Heel 9 cm.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details and lightly padded cups with removable inserts. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and a wide, ribbed hem. Light support.
Pyjamas with a T-shirt and shorts in cotton jersey. T-shirt with a motif on the chest. Patterned shorts with an elasticated waist, side pockets and fake fly.
Short, A-line skirt with a high waist and buttons down the front.
Leggings in soft corduroy velour made from a cotton blend with a high, elasticated waist.
Body in soft mesh and microfibre with a deep V-neck, wide shoulder straps that twist at the back and a lined gusset with press-studs.

prod_name: Petite Jade HW Denim Trash TRS
detail_desc: High-waisted jeans in washed, superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and super-skinny legs.

Briefs in cotton jersey with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.

Shirt in a cotton herringbone weave with a button-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket and yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Wide-fitting sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with short cap sleeves and an opening with crossover straps and a decorative knot at the back. Slightly longer at the back.
Fitted top in soft cotton jersey with a V-neck, gathered seam at the front and long sleeves.
T-shirt in jersey made from a silk and cotton blend with a ribbed turtle neck and straight-cut hem.
Sleeveless shirt dress in a viscose weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Detachable tie belt at the waist and a gently rounded hem.
Sandals in leather with square toes, covered block heels and narrow straps that wind and tie around the ankle. Leather linings and insoles and finely fluted rubber soles. Heel 5.5 cm.
Top in light, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline,cuffs and hem.
Short polo-neck top in viscose jersey with long sleeves.

5-pocket shorts in stretch, supersoft denim. Regular waist with a concealed drawstring at the front and covered elastication at the back, a zip fly and button, and slim legs that finish just above the knees.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button at the waist, and skinny legs.
Short dress in a viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a V-neck with ties at the front, and a gathered seam at the waist. Unlined.
Long-sleeved tops in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend.
Knitted tube scarf.
Cropped, sleeveless sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a twisted detail at the hem.

Short, wrapover dress in a patterned weave with a V-neck, concealed press-stud at the top and 3/4-length sleeves with a wide flounce and sewn-on bow. Seam at the waist with a tie belt, a gently flared skirt and a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Fitted top in soft organic cotton jersey with 3/4-length sleeves and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.

Set with a top and pair of shorts in soft cotton jersey. Top with appliqués on the front and flounced sleeves that continue down the sides. Shorts with a decorative bow at the front, an elasticated waist with a small frill trim at the top and diagonal side pockets.
Short, wide coat in faux fur with a sheep wool texture. Large hood, large buttons down the front, pockets in the side seams and one inner pocket. Satin lining.
T-shirt in soft jersey with reversible sequins on the front and a rounded hem.
Lightly padded sleeping bag in soft, patterned cotton jersey with press-studs at the top and a jersey lining. Polyester padding. The sleeping bag is designed for indoor use.
Poncho top with short butterfly sleeves and a rounded hem.
Leggings in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elastication at the waist and hems.

Suit trousers in woven fabric with an extended waistband with a button, zip fly and an adjustable tab and button at the sides. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button, and slightly shorter legs with creases and turn-up hems. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Long-sleeved shirt in a viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and fringe-trimmed flounce. Buttoned cuffs with a fringe-trimmed flounce.
Boxer briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.

Satin top with a shimmering pattern. Opening at the front with narrow ties at the neckline and short puff sleeves with elastication. Seam at the waist, concealed elastication at the back and a flared peplum.
Trainers in scuba fabric with imitation leather details, elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the top and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Trainers in mesh with imitation leather and imitation suede details, a lightly padded edge and lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
